title: Amzer Luxe Argyle Skin Case for Sprint HTC Hero - Smoke Gray
features: Reinforced Luxe Argyle Skin provides everyday protection against impact, scratches, dirt, dust, moisture, and more.
All phone features are fully accessible through the case without removing the case.
Perfect match for your Sprint HTC Hero to protect against scratches and bumps.
Included Screen protector provide maximum protection.
Precise cutouts available for full access to all ports and controls.
description: Looking for a mobile makeover? Amzer Luxe Argyle Skin Case has got just what it takes to transform your lackluster device into a Luxe and glamorous Smartphone. The flexible yet durable skin resists impacts and abrasions so your Sprint HTC Hero is kept in “just out of the box” condition. Designed to give you full access to your keyboard and all other critical controls, for a fashionably functional Sprint HTC Hero. The bold colors and distinct embossed argyle pattern offer solid protection with a little bit of fashionable flair!
